start.text: Time to make our wages worthwhile!!
Why do we address only you as 'Captain'? Aren't we all the captains of our ships?
They better not have any phase ships.
Let's show them what the navy's good for!
I don't know who I am, I don't know why I'm here. All I know is I must kill.

start_boss.text: We can do this... We can do this...
Game's about to get ugly, boys and girls!
Dang... Are we up for this?
Things are about to get SPICY!
Die, monster! You don't belong in this world!

out_of_missiles.text: We're out of fireworks! It's down to you, gunnery crew!

need_help.text: This is all getting a little much!

pursuing.text: That's a nice bridge... Be a shame if something happened to it!
We've got'em now! Go go go, get us in there!

running.text: Stars! We need to catch our breath!
Yikes! Get us out of here!

hull_90.text: Taking hits! Catch your footing and strike back!

hull_50.text: We're taking a beating! Hang in there, crew!
We're getting jumped, permission to disengage?

hull_30.text: Ready escape pods! Stay safe, everybody!
It's only me left on the bridge! I can't do this, Captain!

overload.text: Where'd I leave my fire extinguisher...
Damn it! We're lit up like a christmas tree!

death.text: Save yourselves, everybody! Live, and come back to me!
It was fun while it lasted. Grrr, ejecting!

victory.text: Aww, the fun time's over. See you next time, Captain!
Hell yeah, time for salvage! I'll get suited up.
Thanks for coming to the stream! Yukisuna signing off.
Time to go pet the fox and unwind.

victory_boss.text: WE GOT IT! WE GOT IT, WE GOT IT, WE GOT IT!!!
It's down, and we're not! YEAH!!
Mankind needs a saviour such as you!
